subject: detect test failure in teardown()
msgSnippet: Hi, Is there an easy way to determine if a test failed / erred during the teardown() method? I have some JDBC tests. I have been requested to provide an option
messageBody:
Hi,

Is there an easy way to determine if a test failed / erred during the
teardown() method?

I have some JDBC tests. I have been requested to provide an option to
leave the database intact in cases where a test fails, so that we can
do further debugging with the created data. Usually the database
resources are destroyed, leaving the database clean for the next run.

In this case, I want to leave the database intact and immediately exit.

Thanks!
